title: 2021 How to Use Publisher Rocket: Finding Profitable Keywords

tactics.name: AMS Keyword Search
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to extract Amazon keyword suggestions for book marketing
steps: Add keywords to Amazon ad campaigns
source_quotes: once you've entered your keyword...press add keywords right and then save

tactics.name: Competition Analyzer
tactics.description: Evaluate book profitability using sales data and competition metrics
steps: Check search volume and revenue estimates
source_quotes: this book in particular is obviously extremely profitable...eleven thousand in daily sales

tactics.name: Keyword Competition Analysis
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to identify keywords with low competition and high profitability by comparing search volume, competitive scores, and monthly earnings.
steps: Input keywords into Publisher Rocket's keyword search tool
Filter by competitive score (e.g., <50) and search volume
Compare monthly earnings and competitor counts
caveats: Requires up-to-date keyword data for accuracy
source_quotes: 'this has a competitive score of 42 which is a lot easier to compete for'

heuristics.name: Low Competition Targeting
heuristics.condition: If competition score is below 50, prioritize keyword
source_quotes: this has a competitive score of 42 which is a lot easier

heuristics.name: Low Competition High Profit
heuristics.condition: If a keyword has low competitive score and higher monthly earnings than search volume
source_quotes: 'strangely enough this makes more money on average per month'

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket is a one-time purchase with lifetime access
source_quotes: it's a one-time purchase...any future updates...are completely free

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket's keyword search tool helps identify profitable Amazon niches by analyzing competition and earnings data.
source_quotes: 'I primarily use publisher rocket for the AMS keyword search feature'

niche_patterns.description: Target specific audience needs with content constraints
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Balances keyword demand with niche specificity
source_quotes: this keyword search query term...1324 search queries...$625 per month

niche_patterns.example: keto diet + ketogenic air fryer cookbook
niche_patterns.description: Broad keywords with specific longtail variations reduce competition while maintaining search volume.
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Balances search volume with lower competition for higher profitability
source_quotes: 'this is a very vague and broad longtail oh sorry short tail keyword'
